channel.title: WeRule
channel.description: Mentorship platform connecting experienced professionals with aspiring mentees

item.title: Who We Are
item.content:encoded: WeRule is a community-focused mentorship platform that believes in the power of human connection and knowledge sharing. We facilitate meaningful relationships between mentors and mentees to foster growth, learning, and professional development.

item.title: Mentors
item.content:encoded: Our mentor program connects experienced professionals with those seeking guidance. Mentors commit to regular meetings and provide valuable insights from their career journey.

item.title: Mentees
item.content:encoded: The mentee program is designed for individuals looking to accelerate their growth through personalized guidance from experienced professionals in their field.

item.title: Pricing
item.content:encoded: Subscription plans will be available starting September 1, 2025. We're currently in beta and accepting applications for our founding community.
